abstract: CNN finished first in cable news ratings between 8 and 10 p.m. on Monday, with 3.162 million viewers tuning in to watch its coverage of the debate in New Hampshire among Republican candidates for president.
snippet: CNN finished first in cable news ratings between 8 and 10 p.m. on Monday, with 3.162 million viewers tuning in to watch its coverage of the debate in New Hampshire among Republican candidates for president.
lead_paragraph: CNN pushed to the top of cable news ratings Monday night with its coverage of the debate in New Hampshire among Republican candidates for president.

headline.main: Debate Coverage Brings CNN a Ratings Win
